title: Web3 Convention
subtitle: < Sydney, July 22 - 23 2023 />
description: Most influential gathering of crypto, blockchain, NFT, Web 3.0 and Web 2.0. Web3 Convention is an event to explore the future of Web 2.0 and Web 3.0.  The convention aims to bridge the gap between Web2 and Web3.

title: Web3 Hackathon
subtitle: < Australia, May 25 - July 23 2023 />
description: Web3 Hackathon is Australia most premier annual hackathon event catered to a global audience to support the next generation of Web3 innovation and products.

title: Web3 Uni Hackathon
subtitle: < Australia, Mar 22 - May 25 2023 />
description: As part of Web3 Convention, W3C will host a web3 hackathon for students from March 15th to July 23rd, 2023 with over $300k in grants and prizes.
